text: Oru Prathyeka Ariyippu is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Paul Njarakkel, starring Vijayaraghavan and Prem Kumar in the lead roles. http://www.malayalamcinema.com/userreview_oru-prathyeka-ariyippu-.htm ==Cast== * Vijayaraghavan as Vishnu *KPAC Sunny as SP Rajasekharan *Balan K Nair as Raghavan *Jagannathan as Dasappan *Kollam Ajith as Vasu *Kollam Thulasi as Das *Prathapachandran as Minister *KPAC Azeez as Kattumooppan *Valsala Menon as Maheswari ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Oru Prathyeka Ariyippu
